Bloomberg)-- Andy Coulson resigned as director of communications for U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron , citing "continuing pressures" over allegations of illegal phone tapping while he was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today. be for president or governor, gave few clues Monday as he addressed the Indiana General Assembly. Those who expect Mike Pence , R-Columbus, to run for governor may have been heartened by his statement to lawmakers that the states hold the promise of the future. Those who are pushing him instead to run for the White House in 2012 may focus in on his call for a "new federalism"-- which sounded like a budding presidential slogan.

He then spent a year investigating and interviewing the team of experts across the country who worked as advocates for the dogs and their rehabilitation. Fighting dogs, especially pit bulls, are almost always considered beyond help and euthanized. So this was a landmark legal decision to allow a team of experts to come in and attempt to restore the unimaginable damage inflicted upon these dogs. The rehabilitation of Michael Vick 's dogs was kept secret at first, even though his trial gained national attention, in order to protect the dogs from thieves of the dog fighting underworld. Fresh doubts have been raised about his competence and judgment, Mr Andy Burnham said.
